name: Tawamu i-call
storyline:
The protagonist volunteers at the hospital where her sister is hospitalized, and is asked by the doctor to be a companion for the children in the same ward.
The children, who have been in a coma for various reasons, have just woken up after participating in a clinical trial.
A quiet hospital.
A graceful hospital.
The inertia of time and the piercing i-call.
summary: Tawamu i-call is a short game with a romantic friendship element that is mainly conversational released by kanekodou.
